name: Frog Capture
description:
Game made by 6 brazilian friends for the MiniJam 79. Where the theme was "Frogs" and the limitation was "Only one Level".

Made in 48h, the goal of the game is to capture all frogs in the island using WASD to walk and "E" to capture them with your net.

Thanks to my team, Eduardo, Luan, Alexandre, Nicolas and Igor for dedicating their weekend to make this with me.
